oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Newspaper article attacking Col. Luke Lea for wartime conduct
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A news clipping of an article that appeared in the Memphis Press-Scimitar impugning the conduct of Col. Lea in his abortive attempt to kidnap Kaiser Wilhelm from his Dutch residence. Luke Lea of Nashville and several men of the 114th FA, 30th Div. conspired to kidnap the Kaiser from the Dutch residence where he was in exile. The attempt failed, but the Tennesseans managed to actually get into the house and some returned home with souvenirs of their exploits.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
